Package com.mimecast.robin.main

Class Server

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.main.Foundation
com.mimecast.robin.main.Server
public class Server extends Foundation
Main server class for the Robin SMTP server.

This class is responsible for initializing and managing the server's lifecycle.

It loads configurations, sets up SMTP listeners, and starts various background services such as metrics, client endpoints, and queue processing.

The server is started by calling the static run(String) method with the path to the configuration directory.

This class also handles graceful shutdown of the server and its components.

  • Field Details

    • listeners

      private static final List<SmtpListener> listeners
      List of active SMTP listener instances. Using a standard ArrayList as the list is populated at startup and not modified thereafter.

    • listenerExecutor

      private static ExecutorService listenerExecutor
      Executor service for running the SMTP listeners in separate threads. This provides better resource management than creating individual threads.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static void run(String path) throws ConfigurationException
      Initializes and starts the Robin SMTP server.
      Parameters:
      path - The directory path containing the configuration files.
      Throws:
      ConfigurationException - If there is an issue with the configuration files.

    • startup

      private static void startup()
      Starts up the prerequisite services for the server. This includes storage cleaning, queue management, metrics, and client endpoints.

    • initializeVault

      private static void initializeVault()
      Initializes HashiCorp Vault integration for secrets management. Vault secrets can be used as magic variables in configurations. Secrets are fetched on-demand and cached for performance.

    • registerShutdownHook

      private static void registerShutdownHook()
      Registers a shutdown hook to ensure graceful termination of the server. This hook will be called by the JVM on shutdown.

    • loadKeystore

      private static void loadKeystore()
      Loads the SSL keystore for secure connections. The keystore path and password are read from the server configuration.

    • getListeners

      public static List<SmtpListener> getListeners()
      Gets the list of active SmtpListener instances.
      Returns:
      A list of SmtpListeners.
